p: Additionally, reactivation of the pathogen was carried out using agar-sweet pepper (macerated plant material added to agar-agar) [ 37]. Likewise, the virulence of strains isolated from C. gloeosporioides was assessed using wet chamber mounts (Available online as Supplementary Material: 4â€”photographic record of in vitro evaluations of pathogen activity (Reactivation of the pathogen; Virulence of strains)).
